sage.animation

Class AnimationSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.animation.AnimationSequence

  • public class AnimationSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    An AnimationSequence holds a sequence of AnimationKeyFrames defining a particular animation. Each AnimationSequence has a name (e.g. "Walk", "Run", "Death1", "Rest", or something similar) and a set of AnimationKeyFrames describing the animation implied by the name (walk, run, etc.)
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationSequence()
      This constructor creates a default AnimationSequence whose name is the String "NoName" and which has an empty set of AnimationKeyFrames.
      AnimationSequence(java.lang.String name)
      This constructor creates an AnimationSequence with the specified name and an empty set of AnimationKeyFrames.
      AnimationSequence(java.lang.String name, float length)
